name: Exit Ticket 3-2-1
description:
"An effective format for an exit ticket. Learners are asked to post: 3 things they learned today;
2 things they found interesting or want to learn more about; 1 question they still have."
columns:
3 Things I Learned
2 Thing I Found Interesting
1 Question I Have
intro:
This board contains three columns: 3 Things I Learned; 2 Thing I Found Interesting; 1 Question I Have.

Select the plus button in each column to add a post listing the relevant items as outlined in the column heading.
